entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:23 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 30 overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 06:23 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023
